alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 12:29PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Madison, southeastern Beaverhead and southeastern Gallatin Counties through 115 PM MDT... At 1228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles south of Ennis to 17 miles north of Kilgore. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ennis, Big Sky, Lakeview, Yellowstone Village, Jeffers, Cameron, Raynolds Pass and Red Rock Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
